label: 内裏大番
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Imperial palace guard service in Kyoto. Organized on a province-by-province basis during Heian times, with the responsibility for duty falling on major local warriors. From early Kamakura times on, only vassals of the new Bakufu discharged this service.
